welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zhubei, Taiwan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming blend of modernity and tradition, as you explore our city known for its vibrant night markets, delicious street food, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and make the most of all that Zhubei has to offer!
